description: This file defines the BudgetService class, which provides static methods to fetch budgets and analytics data from a backend API. It interacts with an AuthService for authentication headers and uses the http package for network requests.

classes.name: BudgetService
classes.description: A service class providing static methods for retrieving budget and analytics data

methods.name: fetchBudgets
methods.description: Fetches the list of budgets for the authenticated user by calling the API endpoint '/budgets'. Returns a list of maps representing budgets.

methods.name: fetchAnalytics
methods.description: Fetches spending analytics data such as category breakdowns from the '/analytics/spending' endpoint.
